name: mnemonicforge-raycast
description: Raycast extension for the MnemonicForge prompt library.

raycast.title: MnemonicForge
raycast.description: Browse, parameterize, and run prompts from your MnemonicForge library.
raycast.author: MnemonicForge Team

commands.name: run-prompt
commands.title: Run Prompt
commands.subtitle: MnemonicForge
commands.description: Fill parameters and generate a prompt output.

preferences.name: promptsPath
preferences.title: Prompts Folder
preferences.description: Absolute path to your prompt_templates directory (e.g., /Users/you/.../prompt_templates).

preferences.name: pasteAfterCopy
preferences.title: Paste After Copy
preferences.description: Automatically paste rendered output after it is copied.

preferences.name: enableSend
preferences.title: Enable OpenAI Send
preferences.description: Allow prompts to be sent directly to OpenAI when ⌘↵ is pressed.

preferences.name: openaiModel
preferences.title: Default OpenAI Model
preferences.description: Model name used when sending prompts (overridden by prompt metadata).

preferences.name: openaiTemperature
preferences.title: Default Temperature
preferences.description: Temperature value used for OpenAI sends when not specified in a prompt.

preferences.name: openaiMaxTokens
preferences.title: Default Max Tokens
preferences.description: Maximum tokens requested from OpenAI when not set in a prompt.

preferences.name: contextDefaultClipboard
preferences.title: Capture Clipboard by Default
preferences.description: Include current clipboard text in the contextual data sent to prompts.

preferences.name: contextDefaultSelection
preferences.title: Capture Selected Text by Default
preferences.description: Automatically capture the current text selection as context.

preferences.name: contextDefaultApp
preferences.title: Capture Frontmost App by Default
preferences.description: Include the name and bundle ID of the active application in context.

preferences.name: contextDefaultDate
preferences.title: Capture Current Date by Default
preferences.description: Add the current ISO8601 timestamp to the prompt context.

preferences.name: debugLog
preferences.title: Enable Debug Logging
preferences.description: Emit verbose logs to Raycast console for troubleshooting.
